Snake.description: Classic snake game in landscape mode
Snake.controls: Joystick for direction, avoid walls and yourself

Tetris.controls: L/R=move, Up=hard drop, Down=soft drop, Joy Btn=rotate, BtnA=hold piece
Tetris.features: Ghost piece, hold system, lock delay 500ms, line counter, level progression every 10 lines

Breakout.description: Endless breakout with random brick patterns
Breakout.features: Random brick rearrangement each level, bonus life every 600 points, speed progression 5% per level

SpaceWars.features: Enemy gets faster and more erratic, bullet hell at high levels, unlimited rockets, bonus life every 3 levels

Pong.features: First to 10 points wins, ball speeds up with each hit

Dodge.controls: Joystick=move in all directions, Joy Btn=rotate T-piece
Dodge.features: Precise block collision, level up every 100 points, faster spawning each level

requirements: Mini Joy C Hat (required for all games)
usage_instructions: 1. Connect Mini Joy C hat to M5StickC Plus2
2. Flash firmware using M5Burner with MERGED.bin
3. Power on to see game menu
4. Use joystick Up/Down to select game
5. Press BtnA to start selected game
6. Press BtnB during gameplay to return to menu
7. Each game has unique controls - see in-game

technical_details.collision_detection: Pixel-perfect for Dodge, bounding box for others
technical_details.ai_difficulty: Progressive in Space Wars, fixed in Pong

version_history.1.0.0: Initial release: 7 complete games with Mini Joy C support, optimized menu, precise collision in Dodge
